revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Alpha |model=AFW-GR50 |revision= |asin=B00I9BPZ8O |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=China only |est_release_date=08/2005 |fcc_date=10/26/2005 |fcc_id=RAXWG4005F |pcb_id= |type=wireless router |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2315 |cpu1_cspeed=180 |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25P16VFIG |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16400B-7T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2315 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Default |default_ssid_regex=^Default$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=20:03:7F |oui_eth=20:03:7F }} {{TagLine|54M Wireless Broadband Router}}
This device is assumedly ''[[Atheros]]'' based (probably using AR2315). :A date code of '''0526''' (July 2005) is silkscreened on the board.
*[http://www.pcpop.com/doc/0/120/120566.shtml Device disassembled on '''pcpop.com'''], dated 2005-12-06 :Specifications used in this entry are per this page..
===Reviews=== *[http://article.pchome.net/content-65567-1.html On '''pcpop.com'''], dated 2005-11-04 :The default SSID appears to be '''Default'''. *[http://publish.it168.com/2005/1107/20051107027501.shtml On '''it168.com'''] ([https://3g.163.com/digi/photoview/0016/134824.html Gallery]) :20:03:7F OUIs *[http://news.zol.com.cn/23/235423.html Profile on '''news.zol.com.cn'''] :This board is using '''Fcon''' branded capacitors, date code '''0526'''
